resources.string: Use a Google Sign In credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Use a Facebook Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Use a Twitter Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Use an email and password to authenticate with Firebase.
Use only an email to authenticate with Firebase.
Use a phone number to authenticate with Firebase.
Sign in anonymously and then later upgrade to a full Firebase Auth user.
Use a custom token signed by your own server to authenticate with Firebase.
Use the FirebaseUI-Android library to authenticate with Firebase.
Use a generic identity provider, like Microsoft or Yahoo, to authenticate with Firebase.
Send link to your email to get started.
Link sent, check your email to continue.
Link received, enter email to sign in.
Nhập số điện thoại của bạn

string.name: fui_invalid_phone_number
string.translation_description: Inline error when phone number entered is invalid

string.name: fui_enter_confirmation_code
string.translation_description: Phone number verification code entry form title

resources.string: Nhập mã gồm 6 ký tự chúng tôi gửi qua sms

string.name: fui_resend_code_in
string.translation_description: Countdown timer text that the user needs to wait for before attempting to resend verification sms

resources.string: Gửi lại mã xác thực trong 0:%02d

string.name: fui_verify_your_phone_title
string.translation_description: Button text to complete phone number verification

string.name: fui_verifying
string.translation_description: Progress dialog text while phone number is being verified

string.name: fui_incorrect_code_dialog_body
string.translation_description: Inline error when incorrect sms verification code is being used to verify

resources.string: Sai mã xác thực, thủ lại

string.name: fui_error_too_many_attempts
string.translation_description: Error message when the phone number has been used too many times

resources.string: This phone number has been used too many times

string.name: fui_error_quota_exceeded
string.translation_description: Error message when the Firebase project's quota has been exceeded.

resources.string: There was a problem verifying your phone number

string.name: fui_error_session_expired
string.translation_description: Error message when SMS confirmation code has expired.

resources.string: This code is no longer valid

string.name: fui_sign_in_with_phone_number
string.translation_description: Label for phone number input form

resources.string: Đăng nhập với số điện thoại

string.name: fui_auto_verified
string.translation_description: Popup informing the user that their phone number was automatically verified

string.name: fui_resend_code
string.translation_description: Link text to resend verification sms

string.name: fui_verify_phone_number
string.translation_description: Button text to submit confirmation code and complete phone verification

string.name: fui_sms_terms_of_service
string.translation_description: Fine print warning displayed below Verify Phone Number button

string.name: fui_sms_terms_of_service_and_privacy_policy_extended
string.translation_description: Fine print warning displayed below Verify Phone Number button

resources.string: An SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.
